blueprint.description: Installs McFly (which is an intelligent search engine for your terminal) on Linux and macOS
blueprint.overview: [McFly](https://github.com/cantino/mcfly) replaces your default CTRL-r shell history search with an intelligent search engine that takes into account your working directory and the context of recently executed commands. McFly's suggestions are prioritized in real time with a small neural network.
blueprint.name: McFly
blueprint.title: McFly
